{"id":1454821350,"question_id":3639,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1731811535,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"128 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1454821350/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zero Array Transformation I","memory":"327.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isZeroArray(vector<int>& nums, vector<vector<int>>& queries) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        vector<int> diff(N+1, 0);\n        for (auto q : queries) {\n            diff[q[0]]--;\n            diff[q[1]+1]++;\n        }\n        vector<int> A(N, 0);\n\n        A[0] = diff[0];\n        for (int i=1; i<N; i++)\n            A[i] = diff[i] + A[i-1];\n\n        bool ans = true;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++)\n            ans &= ((A[i] + nums[i]) <= 0);\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zero-array-transformation-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
